import React,{useRef,useState}from'react';import{createChart}from'lightweight-charts';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockChart=()=>{const chartContainerRef=useRef();const chartRef=useRef(null);const[symbol,setSymbol]=useState('');const fetchAndRenderChart=async ticker=>{try{const res=await fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/stock-data?symbol=${ticker}`);const json=await res.json();const data=json.data;if(!data||data.s!=='ok'){alert('Invalid symbol or no data found.');return;}const formattedData=data.t.map((time,i)=>({time:time,open:data.o[i],high:data.h[i],low:data.l[i],close:data.c[i]}));// Clear previous chart if it exists
if(chartRef.current){chartRef.current.remove();}const chart=createChart(chartContainerRef.current,{width:chartContainerRef.current.clientWidth,height:400});chart.addCandlestickSeries().setData(formattedData);chartRef.current=chart;}catch(err){console.error('Failed to load chart:',err);alert('Error fetching data.');}};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();const ticker=symbol.trim().toUpperCase();if(ticker){fetchAndRenderChart(ticker);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card mt-4 shadow-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",children:"Stock Chart Viewer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,className:"form-inline mb-3",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control mr-2",placeholder:"Enter stock symbol (e.g. AAPL)",value:symbol,onChange:e=>setSymbol(e.target.value),required:true,style:{maxWidth:'300px'}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-outline-dark",children:"Load Chart"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:chartContainerRef,style:{width:'100%',height:'400px'}})]})});};export default StockChart;
